column5: Hey what should we expect Thanks for your help

[font color=green size=3][b]A quick look at bank exchange rates today say 1 USD = $1.3271 Canadian. However if you don't exchange your money at a bank you can expect that tourist operators who are there to make money, are going to do just that!
I was in Ontario on Sunday, the exchange was $1.40 Canadian. Jeff
Here is the official Bank of Canada converter for daily rates.http://www.bankofcanada.ca/en/exchform.htm Just save the address in your favorites for later use.
The use of credit cards, if possible, will ensure you get a fair exchange rate regardless where you go. For those outfitters not equipped or not willing to take credit cards, bring cash.
Credit cards are nice but some charge an extra 3% for using one. Ask before you slide the plastic. Banks on the other hand charge a 4% rate for cash transactions exchanges so it all balances out.
